title: VA.gov | Veterans Affairs
author: US Department; Veterans Health Administration
description: Apply for and manage the VA benefits and services you've earned as a Veteran, Servicemember, or family member—like health care, disability, education, and more.
cleaned_text: Attention A T users. To access the menus on this page please perform the following steps. 1. Please switch auto forms mode to off. 2. Hit enter to expand a main menu option (Health, Benefits, etc). 3. To enter and activate the submenu links, hit the down arrow. You will now be able to tab or arrow up or down through the submenu options to access/activate the submenu links. Us [VA](https://www.va.gov/)» [Health Care](https://www.va.gov/health)» [Public Health](/index.asp)» Military Exposures Public Health [] Military Exposures Veterans may have been exposed to a range of chemical, physical, and environmental hazards during military service. Military Exposures & Your Health Newsletter The latest issue of the quarterly newsletter [Military Exposures & Your Health](/exposures/publications/military-exposures/meyh-9/index.asp) contains updates on the Gulf War Era Cohort Study, the Airborne Hazards and Burn Pits Center of Excellence, and military exposures and reproductive health. 4 Ways to Find Exposures Related Health Concerns [Agent Orange Related Diseases](/exposures/agentorange/conditions/index.asp) Pollutants](/exposures/categories/air-pollutants.asp)(burn pit smoke, dust...) [Occupational Hazards](/exposures/categories/occupational-hazards.asp)(asbestos, lead...) [Warfare Agents](/exposures/categories/warfare-agents.asp)(chemical and biological weapons) Exposure Topics A-Z Registry Evaluation A free [medical assessment](/exposures/benefits/registry-evaluation.asp) for possible health problems related to specific environmental hazards Health Care [Health care services](/exposures/benefits/health-care.asp) for eligible Veterans, how to qualify and apply Research Studies Find out about [military exposure-related research studies](/exposures/research-studies.asp) Publications & Reports Use these [resources and media materials](/exposures/publications/index.asp) on military exposures and Veterans
